title: Coastal New South Wales Escape
description: Looking for an easy weekend getaway? Indulge in a much-deserved escape in Wollongong, on the scenic coast of New South Wales only an hour from Sydney. Explore the plethora of beautiful beaches, coastal walks, attractions and delicious restaurants that the South Coast has to offer with two or three nights at the Sage Hotel Wollongong with daily buffet breakfast, a drink on arrival and a late checkout.

title: Scenic Coastal Escape - Only an Hour From Sydney
description: Looking for a weekend getaway? Indulge in a much-deserved escape in Wollongong, on the scenic coast of New South Wales only an hour from Sydney. Explore the plethora of beautiful beaches, coastal walks, attractions and delicious restaurants that the South Coast has to offer with two or three nights at the Sage Hotel Wollongong with complimentary daily buffet breakfast and two drink vouchers. Family options available!
offer_address: 60-62 Harbour Street, Wollongong 2500, New South Wales, Australia

title: Brand New Coastal Escape in the Heart of Wollongong with Daily Breakfast
description: Lose yourself to the laidback lifestyle and coastal beauty of New South Wales with a stay at Hotel TOTTO Wollongong. The brand new sleek retreat, opened in early 2023, is in the heart of this beach town, beloved among surfers. Discover sun-kissed beaches and mingle with the trendy locals as you stroll the beachfront promenade dotted with cool cafes and lush green spaces. Start each day with a breakfast at BASTA Trattoria, choosing from Australian classics ranging from smashed avocado on toast with fresh eggs to smoked salmon on sourdough. After a lazy day on the beach, treating your tastebuds to authentic wood-fired pizza with a side of olives, prosciutto, and of course a glass of Aperol Spritz will be just the thing you need.
offer_address: 60 Market Street, Wollongong, New South Wales 2500, Australia

title: Sleek Coastal Escape in the Heart of Wollongong with Daily Breakfast & A$30 Resort Credit
description:
Lose yourself to the laidback lifestyle and coastal beauty of Wollongong, just an hour from Sydney, with a modern stay at this sleek retreat. Located in the heart of the beachside city, beloved among surfers, stroll along The Blue Mile, a lush walking path from Flagstaff Hill to North Wollongong Beach - the perfect spot to take a dip - or wander to Wollongong Central to explore some of the city's best boutiques and stores.

Start each day with breakfast at BASTA Trattoria, choosing from delicious Australian classics. After a lazy day at the beach, treat your tastebuds to authentic wood-fired pizza with a side of olives, prosciutto and, of course, a glass of Aperol Spritz will be sure to hit the spot.
offer_address: 60 Market Street, Wollongong, New South Wales 2500, Australia

title: Beachfront Novotel Wollongong Escape with Cocktails & Daily Breakfast
description:
Wake up to the sounds of the ocean from the newly refurbished Novotel Wollongong Northbeach hotel. Following a complete refurbishment in 2021, all rooms and public areas are shiny and sophisticated, with many maximising the hotel's prime beachfront position by offering stunning ocean views. Spend time in any of the four new onsite food and drink venues: enjoy a sit-down dinner at Palisade Kitchen & Bar, order a lavish cocktail at Adrift Pool Bar, nurse a beer at The Frisky Flamingo sports lounge or choose from an extensive wine list at North Bar. When you’re not indulging your tastebuds, there’s an outdoor heated pool to splash about in, a sauna and fitness centre, and Wollongong’s North Beach right on your doorstep.

Only a 90-minute drive from Sydney, Wollongong makes it too easy to leave behind the hustle and bustle of the city and head for laidback beach town vibes. Whether you’re a keen surfer (or enthusiastic learner), a foodie, seeking seaside family fun or simply in need of a beachfront retreat, there’s something for everyone. Rated in the top five hotels in Wollongong on Tripadvisor, Novotel Wollongong Northbeach invites you to discover the charms of the New South Wales coast in style.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake to a delicious array of breakfast treats with daily buffet breakfast at Palisade Kitchen & Bar
- Toast your escape with one cocktail per adult, per stay, at North Bar
- Be welcomed to your room with a chef’s selection of baked treats
- Enjoy a 15% discount on all food at Palisade Kitchen & Bar, Pepe's on the Beach or The Frisky Flamingo sports lounge (selected dates; see the Fine Print for details)
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi
- Relax up until the very last moment with guaranteed 2pm late checkout

**Ocean View Balcony Upgrade**: Make the most of the hotel's incredible beachfront location when you upgrade to a Superior Queen Ocean View with Balcony. Step onto your private balcony, breathe in the fresh sea air and watch the sunset in blissful privacy. It just doesn't get better than that!

**Travelling with family?** One child (16 and under) stays free in queen rooms or up to two children stay free in twin rooms.
offer_address: 2-14 Cliff Road North Wollongong NSW 2500 Australia

title: Wollongong Coastal Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Leave Sydney's CBD in your rearview mirror and indulge in a well-deserved escape to Sage Hotel Wollongong, a stylish retreat nestled on the scenic south coast of New South Wales. Just a 90-minute drive from Sydney and surrounded by a plethora of beautiful beaches, coastal trails and all-terrain bike tracks, this contemporary hotel is the ideal launchpad for immersing yourself in nature and exploring the very best of the South Coast. Begin each day at onsite The Five Islands Room & Terrace Restaurant and unwind after a long day of exploration at Coldwater Creek Restaurant for contemporary Australian cuisine.

Head into the hinterland for a hiking adventure, take a road trip to admire the azure waters of Lake Illawarra or sink your toes into the soft sands of Wollongong Beach, located directly across the road from the hotel, before returning for a dip in the glorious 20-metre outdoor heated pool.
offer_address: 60-62 Harbour Street, Wollongong 2500, New South Wales, Australia

Start each day with breakfast at BASTA Trattoria, choosing from delicious Australian classics. After a lazy day at the beach, treat your tastebuds to authentic wood-fired pizza with a side of olives, prosciutto and, of course, an Aperol Spritz.

title: Wollongong Coastal Escape just 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast

title: Stylish NSW Apartments on Wollongong Beach
description: Wake up to ocean-tinged air and the sound of waves crashing on the nearby beach at the boutique Adina Apartment Hotel Wollongong. Offering a central location in the vibrant regional city, the hotel is close to plenty of beachfront restaurants and cafés - the perfect snack stops while exploring the surrounding natural beauty. Dive into the heated swimming pool and indulge in the Jacuzzi and sauna, before heading off to see what quaint Wollongong has to offer. Immerse yourself in Buddhist and Hindu culture and architecture, head out on a day trip to the stunning Booderee National Park, or discover why Wollongong has a reputation for some of the best beaches in Australia.
offer_address: 19 Market St, Wollongong, New South Wales 2500, Australia

title: Trendy Coastal Escape in the Heart of Wollongong

After days spent in the ocean and evenings spent dancing in tropical style beer-gardens, treat your tastebuds to an authentic wood-fired pizza at BASTA restaurant.
offer_address: 60 Market Street, Wollongong, New South Wales 2500, Australia
